DataElement.preferredName: Breast Skin Nodule Present Sum Longest Diameter Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the sum of measured or computed lengths of a straight line passing through the center of a circle and connecting two points on the circumference of a raised solid lesion the may be in the epidermis, dermis, or subcutaneous tissue of one of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the presence of a raised solid lesion the may be in the epidermis, dermis, or subcutaneous tissue of one of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.

Concepts.definition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.

Property.preferredDefinition: No Value Exists:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A benign or malignant round or oval and elevated solid lesion that arises from the skin or subcutaneous tissue.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the sum of measured or computed lengths of a straight line passing through the center of a circle and connecting two points on the circumference.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: any measurements, including linear dimensions, volume, and weight, of a patient's tumor.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several.:Dimension; the magnitude of something in a particular direction, especially length or width or height.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

The magnitude of something in a particular direction, especially length or width or height.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
